sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnhttpmon ( SYS_ID , site_url , websvc_knd , http_sttus_code , creat_dt , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm ) VALUES ( #sysId# , #siteUrl# , #websvcKnd# , #httpSttusCode# , #creatDt# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnhttpmon SET sys_id = #sysId# , site_url = #siteUrl# , websvc_knd = #websvcKnd# , http_sttus_code = #httpSttusCode# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# WHERE sys_id = #sysId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT sys_id , site_url , websvc_knd , http_sttus_code , creat_dt , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnhttpmon WHERE sys_id = #sysId#

SELECT sys_id , site_url , websvc_knd , http_sttus_code , creat_dt , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnhttpmon WHERE 1=1
sys_id = #searchKeyword#
site_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY sys_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnhttpmon WHERE 1=1
sys_id = #searchKeyword#
site_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
